title: 搜索二维矩阵 (Search a 2D Matrix)
content: 思路: // @Title: 搜索二维矩阵 (Search a 2D Matrix) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-10-13 22:14:54 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 41.1 MB // @comment: // @flag: GREEN class Solution { public boolean searchMatrix(int[][] matrix, int target) { int x=0,y=matrix[0].length-1; while(x<matrix.length&&y>=0){ if(matrix[x][y]>target){ y--; }else if(matrix[x][y]<target){ x++; }else{ return true; } } return false; } }
